title: Determination of mass concentrations of airborne PET microplastics using liquid chromatography coupled to tandem mass spectrometry (LC-MS/MS)
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00047A, Communication
Open Access

Durga Prasad Patnana, B. P. Chandra
Ubiquitous airborne microplasctics are present in the inhalable fraction of ambient particulate matter. They may induce lesions in the respiratory system dependent on individual susceptibility and particle properties.
